CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 7, 1940, pg. 8, reads: "The Last Days of Summer Socially Gay...Beauty...Exotic Elegance...Charm...Fashion...In Abundance Here - Beautiful visitors to fair Pittsburgh are Mrs. Cordella Wharton, right, and Mrs. Lillian Berry (the former Misses Murdocks), of Washington and Baltimore, respectively. They are guests of the R. L. Vanns. - Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Lillian Murdocks Berry wearing light colored gown with short sleeve bolero jacket and floral detail on skirt, posed next to piano in living room of Vann home
